content: mini boots or stockings these tiny boots and stockings are knit entirely in the round in one piece on dpns the stocking consists of only 6 rounds and the boot is just 3 my favourite part is their bobble toes which makes shaping a breeze i also love their yarn over bind-offs which means no fiddly increases on the top rounds for finishing i simply hide the ends inside and trim carefully they are a fun mindless tv knit i used worsted for mine but you can really push the limits of tiny and use fingering or sock copyright 2025 by natasha hanson all rights reserved 1 stocking instructions finished measurements using your stocking color cast on 6 sts divide the sts boot 0 75 /2cm over 2 dpns 3 sts on both needle 1 & 2 and join to stocking 1 / 2 5cm work in the round approximate yardage round 1 k1 mb k4 2-3 yards this is a great scrappy project round 2-5 knit cut yarn change to top white color yarn round 6 knit for a nice firm fabric i use patons classic worsted do a yarn over bind-off see video link cut yarn needles finishing one set of double-pointed needles dpns in size us 2 tidy up cast off edge as you weave in the end then 2 75mm or desired size hide it in stocking and trim carefully hide the other 2 top ends where you changed color pattern notes inside your stocking and trim carefully 3 stitch bobble i like to use my cast on end to tidy up my bobble toe knit into the front of the next stitch then the back and then hide it inside and trim carefully make then the front turning 1 stitch into 3 another turn knitting and p3 turn knitting and k3 pattern support repeat these two row one more time for pattern support simply pm me on ravelry if you with right side facing pass second stitch on the right enjoyed this pattern check out more fun
